name: 3ashara Talwa
shortDescription: 3ashara Talwa is an online multiplayer game that is based on the rules of the backagamon game on middle east. 3ashara Talwa have two game modes "ma7bosa" and "therteen". 3ashara Talwa have strong Ai, character customization, many game mods and more.
description: 3ashara Talwa is an online multiplayer game that is based on the rules of the backagamon game on middle east. 3ashara Talwa have two game modes "ma7bosa" and "therteen". 3ashara Talwa have strong Ai, character customization, many game mods and more.

name: Estimation Kings
shortDescription: Estimation Kings is a four players trick-taking card game, but once you enter the game you are on your own.
description:
Are you a pro Estimation Player? If you are familiar with Tarneeb, Spades, Trix, Hearts and Balot, you will extremely enjoy playing Estimation.

Estimation Kings is a four players trick-taking card game, but once you enter the game you are on your own.

And remember this rule, only kings survives in this game so you may live as a King or die as a Kooz.
features: Challenge online players from around the world.
Make new friends and chat with them.
Use actions to hit your opponents.
Free to play game without gambling ;)

name: Rhythm Attack
shortDescription: Rhythm Attack is a hyper casual VR game,Where you have to defeat the rythem monsters by cuting the menions they throw at you untill they get tired then attck them with your gun to drain there health, every time you fail to kill the enemy he gets mad and level defficulty increase, this game was a graduation project from ITI game development deploma and it is 100% made by us Coding, Art, music and VFX.
